description: Raise floor for ``s3transfer`` to 0.8.2 to avoid any conflicts with the awscrt

[``botocore``] The AWS Marketplace Agreement Service provides an API interface that helps AWS Marketplace sellers manage their agreements, including listing, filtering, and viewing details about their agreements.
[``botocore``] This release enhances the ListEntities API to support new entity type-specific strongly typed filters in the request and entity type-specific strongly typed summaries in the response.
[``botocore``] AWS Marketplace Deployment is a new service that provides essential features that facilitate the deployment of software, data, and services procured through AWS Marketplace.

[``botocore``] This release adds the following support for Amazon Redshift Serverless: 1) cross-account cross-VPCs, 2) copying snapshots across Regions, 3) scheduling snapshot creation, and 4) restoring tables from a recovery point.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
